eventList.description: Carabiner is a community calendar for Montreal's queer community. It's a queer & bipoc initiative. Every event is moderated and no personal data is kept. Need to update an event, suggest a feature, or just say hi? Drop us a line at hello@carabiner.gay! It's our alternative to the Zuckerverseâ€”it isn't perfect, but it's a start.
